attributes.action: Reduce the price of free from foods as we don't choose to have an allergy.
attributes.additional_details: For example a 500ml dairy free tub of ice cream is £5.99 in one of the main UK supermarkets. £2.50 for 2 chocolate muffins when if they were normal and not free from you could get 4 for £1! I really don't feel this is fair.
attributes.background: If you've got a  gluten, dairy, egg, soya or other of the many allergy's, you will know how much free from cost. The prices at least double just because they are free from! I don't think that this is fair as we do not choose to have an allergy, so therefore I feel the prices should be reduced.
